title: Kanmunne Eththanai Nilavu Song Lyrics Thulluvadho Ilamai
stanzas: <div>Kanmunne Eththanai Nilavu Song Lyrics Thulluvadho Ilamai

Kanmunne eththanai
nilavu kaalaiyile
color color-aai
eththanai pookkal saalaiyile

yen udambilum
udambilum maatram
en thalai mudhal
kaal varai yaekkam

paruvam endraal
eriya vendum kadhalile

vayathukku vantha penne
vaadi munne
ilavasamaai tharuven
enthan idhayam thaane

vali enbathu ini thaane
adhu kooda sugamthaane
oru murai thaan
urasi podi paarvaiyile

adi fifteen ponadhu
sixteen vanthadhu
thavani parthen
meesai vanthadhu
thadavi paarthen parkal
irundhathu munnaale.

irakkam illaiyo
un idhazh thanthaal
en idhazhinil sirai pidippen

un karam thanthaal
en karam kondu
kaalam pidithiruppen

adi fifteen ponadhu
sixteen vanthadhu
thavani parthen
meesai vanthadhu
thadavi paarthen parkal
irundhathu munnaale.

ragasiyamaai paarkka
thoondum aval mugamthaane
velaikkoru pen thana
pirakka vendum
vendiya vayathil aval
irunthida vendum

ada oru pen kadhal
pala palasu ingu
pala pen kaadhal
pudhu pudhusu

thangam konjam endraan
enaku thanga pudhaiyal vendum

vayathukku vantha penne
vaadi munne
ilavasamaai tharuven
enthan idhayam thaane

vali enbathu ini thaane
adhu kooda sugamthaane
oru murai thaan
urasi podi paarvaiyile

ilamaiyile kalviyodu
kadhalum vendum
kaatrillaa idathukkum
naan poven

kannedhire pen irundhaal
naan kanmoodi vazhven

un thagappan thimiraiyum
yaetru kolven
un thaayin thittayum
theerthu konden
un annan anniyum
vaangi kolven
nee enadhu arugil nindraale

vayathukku vantha penne
vaadi munne
ilavasamaai tharuven
enthan idhayam thaane

vali enbathu ini thaane
adhu kooda sugamthaane
oru murai thaan
urasi podi paarvaiyile

irakkam illaiyo
un idhazh thanthaal
en idhazhinil sirai pidippen

un karam thanthaal
en karam kondu
kaalam pidithiruppen

adi fifteen ponadhu
sixteen vanthadhu
thavani parthen
meesai vanthadhu
thadavi paarthen parkal
irundhathu munnaale.

adi fifteen .sixteen. thavani
meesai vanthadhu
thadavi paarthen parkal
irundhathu munnaale.
